itemDisplayName: Deploy a VM Scale Set with a Linux custom image and a custom script for updating a node app without reimaging
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple VM Scale Set usng a custom Linux image. These VMs are behind a load balancer with HTTP load balancing (by default on port 80)
summary: This template deploys a Custom Linux Image behind a load balancer with HTTP load balancing rules and an update script for deploying a node application.
